January 36 - Male, 49, single, producer-director on major networks
at present employed as instructor in radiorTV school, desires, position
in ETVas producer-director, writer, administrator.. Location, salary,
open. '•
January 37 - Male, 49, single, M.A. in sociology, desires;position in
ETV as assistant producer or researcher. Has worked as research and
producer on part of a 30-minute show on an ETV station. Location open.
$3600.
January 38 - Former head of TV research and planning at major univer¬
sity, desires position in educational programming. 10 years profes¬
sional experience in writing, directing, producing motion pictures,
TV and radio - both coasts and overseas. Male, 29 „ B.A., single.
Location open. $500/mth.
January 39 - Retired Army officer engaged as research assistant with
national foundation for educational administration, interested in admin¬
istrative position with ETV. Qualified teacher and has broadcasting
experience in Armed Forces, foreign and commercial radio. Male, 55,
M.S., married. Location, salary, open. ; v
January 40 - Writer, 27, M.A., married, seeking radio-TV position.
He has worked with BBC for 2 years, has contributed to U.S. and British
periodicals, has good news background. Location open. $4500.
January 4-1 - Woman, 52, married, M.A., with teaching background and
several TV workshop certificates desires position as writer, or program
. assistant in ETV. Desires locate in New York City and vicinity.
Salary open.
January.42 - Male, 26, married, B.A., desires position as music direct¬
or in educational broadcasting. Has worked on both commercial and
educational radio. Announces, as well as acting music director.
Location open. $4500.
January 43 Teacher (8 years) who has been writer-director for educa¬
tional and commercial film company, wants producer^coordinator posi¬
tion in ETV. Has supervised live TV show for national organization.
Male, 45, M.A., married. Prefers locate in West or Midwest. $6500.
January 44 - Announcer on commercial radio-TV. for 15 years desires
switch to educational broadcasting. Also taught for 8 years and written
free-lance. Male, 37, A.B., married. Location open. $5000.
